name: Earth Elemental
movement: 30 ft. walking, 30 ft. burrowing through earth
description: A massive creature made of rock, stone, and dirt, animated by elemental magic. Its hulking form can blend into the earth and surprise foes.
memorable: Capable of burrowing through earth and stone without causing disturbances; strong enough to deal double damage to structures.
goals: Often summoned to guard or assist in battles.
relations: Summoned by druids or wizards; may be allies of other earth-related creatures.
environment: Typically found in rocky or earthy terrains.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and durability, with resistance to nonmagical damage and immunity to poison.
weaknesses: Low agility and intelligence limit its mobility and cognitive functions.
attacks: Multiattack with slam attacks, capable of grappling and dealing substantial bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Glide allows it to burrow effortlessly through earth and stone for stealthy movement.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, both extending 60 feet, providing good perception capabilities.
skills: Limited Stealth ability, making it somewhat less adept at sneaking.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, or sleep.
Elemental Resilience grants it immunity to exhaustion and various conditions.
Has advantage on attacks against grappled targets.
test_queries: massive creature made of rock and dirt
earth elemental that can burrow without disturbance
towering monster that deals double damage to structures
strong elemental with unique stealth abilities
